alert.note: Alert for Bell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 7:38PM CDT until April 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL BELL COUNTY... At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nolanville, or near Harker Heights, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Killeen, Harker Heights, Belton, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, Salado, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Belton Lake, Union Grove, Woodland and Moffat. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Texas.
